duties_responsibilities.duty: Edit and enhance content for clarity and correctness as per given guidelines
Review summaries to ensure 100% quality and usability for model training
Collaborate with client product team and other stakeholders to ensure alignment with project requirements while calibrating with the program stakeholders
Develop training content and define guidelines to address any gaps in documentation
Conduct linguistic research and analysis to identify and address language-related challenges and improve the performance of AI systems
Provide guidance and mentorship to the writers sharing expertise and helping to foster a culture of continuous learning and improvement

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, Marketing, Communications, or related field (Master's preferred)
